text: Ernestas Veliulis (born 22 August 1992) is a Lithuanian professional football midfielder who currently plays for Lithuanian A Lyga side FK Panevėžys. He has been capped by Lithuania once, playing for 28 minutes as a substitute in the 1-0 loss to Romania on 23 March 2016. He has also been capped for the Lithuanian under-17 and under-21 sides. == References == Category:Living people Category:Lithuanian footballers Category:Lithuania international footballers Category:A Lyga players Category:1992 births Category:FK Sūduva Marijampolė players Category:FK Daugava (2003) players Category:FK Klaipėdos Granitas players Category:FK Atlantas players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Ernestas Veliulis
